title: Cannot inject opentelemetry Tracer in quarkus-3 app
body:
### Describe the bug

Application is failing to start:
``` ERROR [io.qua.dep.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain] (main) Failed to start quarkus: java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
	[error]: Build step io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#validate threw an exception: jakarta.enterprise.inject.spi.DeploymentException: jakarta.enterprise.inject.UnsatisfiedResolutionException: Unsatisfied dependency for type io.opentelemetry.api.trace.Tracer and qualifiers [@Default]
	- java member: org.acme.opentelemetry.Config#tracer
```

### Expected behavior

app should work with ./mvnw quarkus:dev and via java -jar

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

Unpack and run ./mvnw quarkus:dev [opentelemetry-quickstart.tar.gz](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/11372202/opentelemetry-quickstart.tar.gz)


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_
